TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DllImportSearchPath extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the paths that are used to search for DLLs that provide functions for platform invokes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Use the <xref:System.Runtime.InteropServices.DefaultDllImportSearchPathsAttribute> attribute to apply a set of paths to an entire assembly or to an individual platform invoke.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath ApplicationDirectory = int32(512)

Docs.summary: Include the application directory in the DLL search path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath AssemblyDirectory = int32(2)

Docs.summary: When searching for assembly dependencies, include the directory that contains the assembly itself, and search that directory first. This value is used by the .NET Framework, before the paths are passed to the Win32 [LoadLibraryEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=236091) function.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath LegacyBehavior = int32(0)

Docs.summary: Search the application directory, and then call the Win32 [LoadLibraryEx](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=236091) function with the `LOAD_WITH_ALTERED_SEARCH_PATH` flag. This value is ignored if any other value is specified. Operating systems that do not support the attribute use this value, and ignore other values.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath SafeDirectories = int32(4096)

Docs.summary: Include the application directory, the directory, and user directories in the DLL search path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath System32 = int32(2048)

Docs.summary: Include the directory in the DLL search path.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath UseDllDirectoryForDependencies = int32(256)

Docs.summary: Search for the dependencies of a DLL in the folder where the DLL is located before searching other folders.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Runtime.InteropServices.DllImportSearchPath UserDirectories = int32(1024)

Docs.summary: Include any path that was explicitly added to the process-wide search path by using the Win32 `AddDllDirectory` function.
